help: Display a list of active commands
hang: Start a new game of hangman
hang x: Choose a letter for the hangman game where x is the leter
hang hint: Gives you a hint for hangman
join: Make the bot join your current voice channel
play: Make the bot play a YouTube song (URL)
nowplaying: Get info of currently playing song
stream: Get a live stream of a YouTube URL (currently unstable)
